titleStmt.title: The several statutes in force for the observation of Lent: and fish-dayes, at all other times of the year With full and ready notes in the margent, shewing the effect in brief. / Published by a well-wisher to peace, for the information of all persons subject to the violation of the said laws.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert White, and are to be sold by him at his house in Warwick-Lane in Warwick-Court,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

place.placeName: his house in Warwick-Lane in Warwick-Court
